definition: a blade will get rusty if it is not sharpened; a man will fall behind if he doesn't study (idiom)
pinyin: dao1 bu4 mo2 yao4 sheng1 xiu4 , ren2 bu4 xue2 yao4 luo4 hou4
simplified: 刀不磨要生锈，人不学要落后
word: 刀不磨要生銹，人不學要落後
